DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study assess safety performance Treovance device subject infrarenal aortic aneurysm , specifically evaluate diseased pathology treat acceptable adverse event rate device performs expect . The result study permit establishment endpoint clinical design subsequent U.S. trial .
DOC.brief_title: Treovance Stent-Graft With Navitel Delivery System Patients With Infrarenal Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnose infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) , without iliac artery involvement Subjects infrarenal AAA > /= 4.5 cm diameter male , > /= 4.0 cm diameter female , increase diameter 0.5 cm last 6 month Subjects consent participate Subjects agree comply followup schedule Subjects dissection , rupture aneurysm , symptomatic aneurysm Subjects prior AAA repair Subjects medical condition would complicate endovascular procedure confound result ( e.g. , Marfan 's syndrome , morbid obesity , severe coronary artery disease ) Subjects pregnant lactate Subjects participate investigational study Subjects less 2 year life expectancy
